summary: Replacer Remeshes of the Dawnguard Vampire Armor and Vampire Royal Armor, for use with CBBEv3. This is not a straight conversion, it has additional edits to the CBBEv3 body.
descriptionHtml:
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/pCCVm.png[/IMG]
These are simple replacers for the Dawnguard Vampire Armor and Vampire Royal Armor vanilla meshes, for use with CBBEv3. 
 
[b]Body Type[/b]
As always, I also modified the CBBE v3 body somewhat. For those familiar with my work, this armor uses the same body mesh changes as my previous mods.

I made this mod primarily for use in my own game, rather than for general release.  I know many will be looking for a standard CBBE conversion.  I am certain that another modder (if not Caliente herself) will release a standard version sooner or later.  I will not, so please refrain from making such requests.  

[center]Please check out my Savior\'s Hide and Ancient Nord Armor replacers, Falmer Darkseeker Armor, Field Mage Outfit, Thieves Guild Duelist Armor, and Dread Hunter and Huntress Armors (includes a Dawnguard Edition)[/center]

[center][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10790]Ancient Nord and Savior\'s Hide CBBE v3[/url][/center]
[center][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=11963]Falmer Darkseeker Armor CBBE v3[/url][/center]
[center][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=13646]Thieves Guild Duelist Armor CBBE v3[/url][/center]
[center][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=14198]Field Mage Outfit CBBE v3[/url][/center]
[center][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/21125]Dread Hunter and Huntress Armors (includes a Dawnguard Edition)[/url][/center]

[center][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/RollK.jpg[/IMG] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Z7yeG.jpg[/IMG][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/ePssp.jpg[/IMG] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/51eVt.jpg[/IMG] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/G1OOs.jpg[/IMG]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/HihCu.jpg[/IMG][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/AvHls.jpg[/IMG][/center]

[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/xtr5j.png[/IMG]
- Dawnguard DLC
- [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2666]Caliente\'s Female Body Mod[/url]
- CBBE v3 Compatible Texture (I use [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=6554]Navetsea\'s[/url]) 


[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/0v4Qu.png[/IMG]
  - Open the archive
  - Copy the Meshes folder to the Meshes folder in Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\Data
  - Select \"Yes\" when prompted


[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/e2ur9.png[/IMG]
- some clipping issues with the skirts and cape.


[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/WQcge.png[/IMG]
Caliente - CBBE is an incredible work of art and I very much appreciate Caliente\'s dedication and generosity to the Skyrim community. 

Bethesda - Creating a great game and encouraging us to add something of our own to it.


[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/hQUqJ.png[/IMG]
To CherryHotaling for an excellent and thorough 3DS Max and Nifskope tutorial on armor conversions.
Lonti 
MxR for featuring my mods on Skyrim Mods Weekly.
Saiodin for featuring my  mods on Skyrim Mods Series.

And Everyone who tried out my previous mods, especially those who gave feedback, suggestions, and endorsed.
